name: Leaves' Eyes
description: '''Leaves' Eyes''' is a [[symphonic metal]] band based in Germany, formed in 2003 by [[Liv Kristine]] (ex [[Theatre of Tragedy]]) and Alexander Krull ([[Atrocity (band)|Atrocity]]). Kristine departed in 2016 and was succeeded by [[Elina Siirala]]. The band has released nine studio albums, a live album and DVD as well several singles and EPs.
